com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions

Class AbstractAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions.AbstractAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDynamicallyParameterisableAction, ContributingAction

    public abstract class AbstractAction
extends Object
implements Action
    Reduces the effort it takes to implement the Action interface and offers some convenience methods.

      • findAncestorOfType

        protected <T> T findAncestorOfType(Class<T> type)
        Finds an action with a certain type in the ancestor chain of this action.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the requested action type
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the ancestor to find
        Returns:
        the first ancestor with the given type or null if none of this action's ancestors has the requested type

      • getBodyList

        protected List<?> getBodyList(Context context,
                  Writer writer)
                       throws AluminumException
        Invokes the body of this action, capturing its output.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to execute the body in
        writer - the writer that would normally have been used to invoke the action body with
        Returns:
        the objects that were written by the body
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the body can't be invoked

      • getBodyObject

        protected <T> T getBodyObject(Class<T> type,
                  Context context,
                  Writer writer)
                   throws AluminumException
        Invokes the body of this action, capturing its output, which is expected to be a single object of a certain type. If the body contains no objects, more than one object, or an object of an unexpected type, this method will throw an exception.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the body object
        Parameters:
        type - the expected body object type
        context - the context to execute the body in
        writer - the writer that would normally have been used to invoke the action body with
        Returns:
        the object that was written by the body
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the body can't be invoked or when it does not write exactly one object of the expected type

      • getBodyText

        protected String getBodyText(Context context,
                 Writer writer)
                      throws AluminumException
        Invokes the body of this action, capturing its output as text.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to execute the body in
        writer - the writer that would normally have been used to invoke the action body with
        Returns:
        the text that was written by the body
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the body can't be invoked

      • invokeBody

        protected void invokeBody(Context context,
              Writer originalWriter,
              Writer writer)
                   throws AluminumException
        Invokes the body of this action with a writer, inheriting all decorative writers of the original writer.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to invoke the body with
        originalWriter - the writer that was passed to the execute method
        writer - the writer to invoke the body with
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the body can't be invoked
